mapper.select: SELECT id, title, user_id, DATE_FORMAT(created_time,'%Y.%m.%d.%H.%i') AS created_time, DATE_FORMAT(updated_time,'%Y.%m.%d.%H.%i') AS updated_time FROM post
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO post (user_id, user_pw, title, contents, updated_time) VALUES(#{userId},#{userPw},#{title},#{contents},NOW())
mapper.update: UPDATE post SET user_id=#{userId}, user_pw=#{userPw}, title=#{title}, contents=#{contents}, updated_time=NOW() WHERE id=#{id}
mapper.select: SELECT count(*) as listCnt FROM post
